title: Pakistan Naval Academy (Award of Degrees) Ordinance, 1965
title_en: Pakistan Naval Academy (Award of Degrees) Ordinance, 1965
description: Official consolidated text of Pakistan Naval Academy (Award of Degrees) Ordinance, 1965 (XX of 1965) published by The Pakistan Code (Departmental Laws).

provisions.title: Section 4. Power to make Regulations
provisions.content:
1
ORDINANCE No. XX OF 1965
[4th June, 1965]
An Ordinance to authorise the Pakistan Naval Academy to confer degrees.
WHEREAS it is expedient to authorise the Pakistan Naval Academy to confer degrees;
AND WHEREAS the National Assembly is not in session and the President is satisfied that
circumstances exist which render immediate legislation necessary;
NOW, THEREFORE, in exercise of the powers conferred by clause (1), of Article 29 of the
Constitution and of all other powers enabling him in that behalf, the President is pleased to make and
promulgate the following Ordinance: ––

provisions.title: Section 1. Short title extend and commencement
provisions.content:
_(1) This Ordinance may be called the Pakistan
Naval Academy (Award of Degrees) Ordinance, 1965.
(2) It shall come into force at once.

provisions.title: Section 2. Definitions. In this Ordinance, unless there is anything repugnant in the subject or
provisions.content:
context,––
(a)      “Cadet-entry Officer” means a person appointed as a cadet in any branch of the
Pakistan Navy, and includes any such person promoted to the rank of
midshipman or acting sub-lieutenant, while still undergoing the prescribed
course;
(b)      “prescribed course” means a course of training prescribed by regulations made
under this Ordinance.
2
[3. Conferment of degrees on Cadet-entry Officers. The Pakistan Naval Academy shall
have the power to confer the degree of the Bachelor of Science or Bachelor of Arts, abbreviation
whereof shall be B.Sc (N.A) or B.A (N.A.), respectively, and four years Bachelor of Studies in Naval
and Management Sciences), on any Cadet-entry Officer on his successful completion of the
prescribed course in the Pakistan Naval Academy appropriate to his branch.]
3
[3A.Conferment of degrees on others.___ The Pakistan Naval Academy shall also have the
power to confer the degrees referred to in section 3 on any officer of a foreign government on his
successfully completing the prescribed course in that Academy].
